Wheaton.Chicago Golf Club: Chicago Golf Club is a private golf club in Rochelle, Illinois, in the United States. The course is the oldest 18-hole course in North America, and was, in 1894, one of the five founding clubs of the United States Golf Association (USGA). The club, which has hosted several prominent events, including multiple U.S. Opens and Walker Cups, was founded by renowned course designer and World Golf Hall of Fame member Charles B. Macdonald.
